thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Lazycrazytravellers

author: Lazycrazytravellers
title: Lazycrazytravellers
text:
I have just good words about this cruise.
* the ship is comfortable, a little old, but on the good side the cabins are big and comfortable
* the food is decent, and if you are vegetarian and ask them before they will try to have something special also for you
* expedition team was nice, and we got to see a lot of cool places
* the open bridge policy was amazing, I got to see a lot and learn a lot of things!
Overall I will go back tomorrow:)
